name: Fruit Blaster Mania - Blastings Fruits like Apples, Blueberry, Banana, Strawberry, Orange, Water Melons and Raspberry
name_original: Fruit Blaster Mania - Blastings Fruits like Apples, Blueberry, Banana, Strawberry, Orange, Water Melons and Raspberry
description:
Match and blast fruits switching then into a row of 3,4,5. Play through 3 different modes and endless amounts of fun.

Fruit Blaster Mania is loads of fun and keeps you coming back for more fun. This great puzzle game includes many bonus features that you will have a BLAST with.

Great Features Include:
3 Fun Modes to play
Play levels and see how far you can make it (more then your friends)
Play against the clock
Have Endless fun
Earn token to redeem for cool stuff
Unlock 6 great background

This is an action packed game that you will enjoy time and time again.

This game is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play Fruit Blast Mania!, LIVE in the App Store, TODAY!
